abstract: On the MTV Video Music Awards on Sunday, an award will be devoted to a sponsor for the first time. The award will be for Best Performance in a Pepsi Rock Band Video, as in the Pepsi-Cola soft drink sold by PepsiCo and the Rock Band videogame.
snippet: On the MTV Video Music Awards on Sunday, an award will be devoted to a sponsor for the first time. The award will be for Best Performance in a Pepsi Rock Band Video, as in the Pepsi-Cola soft drink sold by PepsiCo and the Rock Band videogame.
lead_paragraph: There is no Oscar brought to you by Cadillac, no Emmy sponsored by Sony, no Grammy presented by McDonald’s. But on the MTV Video Music Awards on Sunday, among the statuettes known as Moonmen to be handed out will be, for the first time, one devoted to a sponsor.

headline.main: And the Winner Is  … Madison Avenue
